text: Srđan Pecelj (can also be written as Srdjan Pecelj, born 12 March 1975) is a Bosnian former football defender. ==National team== He has played 5 matches for Bosnia and Herzegovina national football team, all of them part of the "Merdeka Cup" in June 2001. ==References== ==Other websites== * Profile at Transfermarkt. * Transfers at Transfermarkt. * Stats from Spain at BDFutbol. * Stats since 2003 at HNL-Statistika Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina footballers
title: Srđan Pecelj
